Act Party uses Tui beer brand tagline ‘Yeah right’ to criticise University of Auckland’s Treaty of Waitangi course https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/act-party-uses-tui-beer-brand-tagline-yeah-right-to-criticise-university-of-aucklands-treaty-of-waitangi-course/ 2DYQ5V6YINHP3NYYFRBLEXHZFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/act-party-uses-tui-beer-brand-tagline-yeah-right-to-criticise-university-of-aucklands-treaty-of-waitangi-course/ 2DYQ5V6YINHP3NYYFRBLEXHZFY/ Cherie Howie'Hey @actnewzealand, keep my beers’ name out of your mouth’. Sat, 12 Oct 2024 04:31:07 +0000 The Act Party's mock Tui 'Yeah right' billboard takes a swipe at the University of Auckland's recent fall in world rankings, amid Act's earlier opposition to the university's plans to introduce a compulsory Treaty of Waitangi course next year. Photo via Facebook
